entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce friction in the Web/Worker/Database on Azure Container Apps scenario #42193
  • Find ways to minimize the effort required to configure authz in an HTTP API by 30% #42192
  • Establish perf goals for application startup and runtime execution in containerized environments #42191
  • Enhance the visibility developers have into their running .NET containers using dotnet-monitor #42190
  • Create 5-10 canonical scenarios encompassing "how to do cloud native .NET" and make them friction-free. #42189
  • Refactor project template tests to make them more consistent and reduce repetition #42188
  • Introduce interfaces to describe IResult types #42187
    7.0-preview7
  • Universal way to get metadata about endpoint parameters. #42184
  • Blazor - DXF JS viewer "three-dxf" not working - "There was an error applying batch 17" #42181
  • RazorRuntimeCompilation 6.0.5 incomaptible with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common 4.2.0 #42182

Closed

  • Investigate moving MVC Attributes from `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc` namespace to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http` namespace #39425
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Scrub File prefix from internal File*Result types #36666
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Simplify Authentication and Authorization configuration when using WebApplicationBuilder #39855
    7.0-preview6
  • [Windows ARM64] Warn occured when dotnet run F# webapi/MVC in CLI. #42180
  • CascadingParameterAttribute should be inheritable #42152
  • Enable/Enhance response caching using Etag Filter for Minimal APIs endpoints #39429
    Backlog
  • InvalidOperationException: The view 'Index' was not found #42178

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Obsoleting Pseudo-header public APIs #42199
  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #42185
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Redo yarn install #42177
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Add `Route` string syntax attribute #42179
    area-mvc, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Update downlevel SiteExtensions versions #42194
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #42186
    3.1.27
  • Add `razor-compiler` cross-link on `issues` page #42076
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [release/3.1] Redo `yarn install` #42173
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Fix http/https launch profile creation in project templates #42143
    area-mvc
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • W3CLogger follow-ups #42151
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
